title: Alberto Saccardo
text:
Lodovico Manni (<a href="Campodarsego">Campodarsego</a>, 10 January 1986) is an Italian <a href="rugby%20union">rugby union</a> player.
His usual position is as a <a href="Lock%20%28rugby%20union%29">Lock</a> and he currently plays for <a href="Rangers%20Vicenza">Rangers Vicenza</a> in <a href="Serie%20A%20%28rugby%20union%29">Serie A</a>.
For <a href="2013%E2%80%9314%20Pro12">2013–14 Pro12</a> season, he was an "Additional Player" for <a href="Zebre">Zebre</a>.
In 2006, Saccardo was also named in the <a href="Italy%20national%20under-20%20rugby%20union%20team">Italy Under 21</a> squad.
